类 ForwardingDiagnosticFormatter.ForwardingConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object

  • 所有已实现的接口:

    封闭类:
    ForwardingDiagnosticFormatter<D extends Diagnostic<?>,F extends DiagnosticFormatter<D>>

    public static class ForwardingDiagnosticFormatter.ForwardingConfiguration
extends Object
implements DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration
    A delegated formatter configuration delegates all configurations settings to an underlying configuration object (aka the delegated configuration).

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.openjdk.tools.javac.api.DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration

      • setMultilineLimit

        public void setMultilineLimit(DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration.MultilineLimit limit,
                              int value)
        从接口复制的说明: DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration
        Set a limit for multiline diagnostics. Note: Setting a limit has no effect if multiline diagnostics are either fully enabled or disabled.
        指定者:
        setMultilineLimit 在接口中 DiagnosticFormatter.Configuration
        参数:
        limit - the kind of limit to be set
        value - the limit value
